mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(noticeno, adminno, title, content, passwd, word, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, rdate) VALUES(notice_seq.nextval, #{adminno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{passwd}, #{word}, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT noticeno, adminno, title, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1 FROM notice ORDER BY noticeno DESC
SELECT noticeno, adminno, title, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, passwd, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1 FROM notice WHERE noticeno = #{noticeno}
